synopsis.text: Force officer, now turned housekeeper, Tsubame Kamoi, arrives at the Takanashi household, bringing with her an unusual affinity for young girls. Misha Takanashi, a second-grader of mixed Russian and Japanese heritage, finds herself the unwanted target of Kamoi's affections. After losing her mother at a tender age, Misha has been living with her Japanese father, but the arrival of Kamoi turns her life into a comedic whirlwind. As the former Self-Defense Force officer leaves no stone unturned to get closer to Misha, the young girl must fend off Kamoi's advances, leading to a series of hilarious and awkward encounters in this unconventional home comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
